languages.text: Пытаясь вымолить помилование, еретичка и пиратка Ризза поведала координаты одного из своих тайников с неправедно нажитым добром. Лорд-капитану рекомендуется реквизировать награбленное имущество, пока его не обнаружили другие пираты.

traits.locale_text: Пытаясь вымолить помилование, еретичка и пиратка Ризза поведала координаты одного из своих тайников с неправедно нажитым добром. Лорд-капитану рекомендуется реквизировать награбленное имущество, пока его не обнаружили другие пираты.

languages.text: In an attempt to purchase her pardon, the heretic and pirate Ryzza gave the Rogue Trader the coordinates of one of her caches containing her ill-gotten gains. The Lord Captain had best requisition the plundered goods before other pirates discover them.
languages.original_text: Пытаясь вымолить помилование, еретичка и пиратка Ризза поведала координаты одного из своих тайников с неправедно нажитым добром. Лорд-капитану рекомендуется реквизировать награбленное имущество, пока его не обнаружили другие пираты.

traits.locale_text: In an attempt to purchase her pardon, the heretic and pirate Ryzza gave the Rogue Trader the coordinates of one of her caches containing her ill-gotten gains. The Lord Captain had best impound the plundered goods before other pirates discover them.

In an attempt to purchase her pardon, the heretic and pirate Ryzza gave the Rogue Trader the coordinates of one of her caches containing her ill-gotten gains. The Lord Captain had best impound the plundered goods before other pirates discover them.

In an attempt to purchase her pardon, the heretic and pirate Ryzza gave the Rogue Trader the coordinates of one of her caches containing her ill-gotten gains. The Lord Captain had best requisition the plundered goods before other pirates discover them.

In an attempt to purchase her pardon, the heretic and pirate Ryzza gave the Rogue Trader the coordinates of one of her caches containing her ill-gotten gains. The Lord Captain had best requisition the plundered goods before other pirates discover them.

languages.text: Ryzza, la pirate hérétique, a donné {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} les coordonnées de l'une de ses caches de biens mal acquis dans l'espoir d'obtenir sa grâce. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} ferait mieux de réquisitionner le butin avant que d'autres pirates ne le découvrent.
languages.original_text: In an attempt to purchase her pardon, the heretic and pirate Ryzza gave the Rogue Trader the coordinates of one of her caches containing her ill-gotten gains. The Lord Captain had best requisition the plundered goods before other pirates discover them.

traits.locale_text: Ryzza, la pirate hérétique, a donné {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} les coordonnées de l'une de ses caches de biens mal acquis dans l'espoir d'obtenir sa grâce. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} ferait mieux de réquisitionner le butin avant que d'autres pirates ne le découvrent.

languages.text: 为了获得赦免，信奉异端的海盗莱萨将其中一处藏匿处的坐标发给了行商浪人，里面藏着她的不义之财。最好赶在其他海盗发现这个地方之前，将其中的战利品搜刮一空。
languages.original_text: In an attempt to purchase her pardon, the heretic and pirate Ryzza gave the Rogue Trader the coordinates of one of her caches containing her ill-gotten gains. The Lord Captain had best requisition the plundered goods before other pirates discover them.

traits.locale_text: 为了获得赦免，信奉异端的海盗莱萨将其中一处藏匿处的坐标发给了行商浪人，里面藏着她的不义之财。最好赶在其他海盗发现这个地方之前，将其中的战利品搜刮一空。

languages.text: 異端者であり海賊であったリザは、自由開拓者の赦しを請うべく不正に得た財宝の隠し場所の座標を自由開拓者に伝えた。他の海賊が発見する前に、ロード・キャプテンが略奪品の引き渡しを要求するのがいいだろう。
languages.original_text: In an attempt to purchase her pardon, the heretic and pirate Ryzza gave the Rogue Trader the coordinates of one of her caches containing her ill-gotten gains. The Lord Captain had best requisition the plundered goods before other pirates discover them.

traits.locale_text: 異端者であり海賊であったリザは、自由開拓者の赦しを請うべく不正に得た財宝の隠し場所の座標を自由開拓者に伝えた。他の海賊が発見する前に、ロード・キャプテンが略奪品の引き渡しを要求するのがいいだろう。

languages.text: Um sich eine Begnadigung zu erkaufen, hat die Ketzerin und Piratin Ryzza {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} die Koordinaten von einem ihrer Beutelager verraten. Der Lord Captain sollte die Beute sichern, bevor andere Piraten sie entdecken.
languages.original_text: In an attempt to purchase her pardon, the heretic and pirate Ryzza gave the Rogue Trader the coordinates of one of her caches containing her ill-gotten gains. The Lord Captain had best requisition the plundered goods before other pirates discover them.

traits.locale_text: Um sich eine Begnadigung zu erkaufen, hat die Ketzerin und Piratin Ryzza {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} die Koordinaten von einem ihrer Beutelager verraten. Der Lord Captain sollte die Beute sichern, bevor andere Piraten sie entdecken.

languages.text: En un intento de ganarse el perdón, la hereje y pirata Ryzza ha proporcionado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente las coordenadas de uno de los alijos donde esconde sus ganancias ilícitas. Será mejor que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se haga con el botín antes de que otros piratas se le adelanten.
languages.original_text: In an attempt to purchase her pardon, the heretic and pirate Ryzza gave the Rogue Trader the coordinates of one of her caches containing her ill-gotten gains. The Lord Captain had best requisition the plundered goods before other pirates discover them.

traits.locale_text: En un intento de ganarse el perdón, la hereje y pirata Ryzza ha proporcionado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente las coordenadas de uno de los alijos donde esconde sus ganancias ilícitas. Será mejor que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se haga con el botín antes de que otros piratas se le adelanten.

languages.text: Af elde etme amacındaki kâfir korsan Ryzza, haram yollarla elde edilmiş ganimetlerini içeren kasalarından birinin koordinatlarını Hür Tacir'e verdi. Lord Kaptan, başka korsanlar tarafından keşfedilmeden önce bu yağmalanmış mallara el koymalı.
languages.original_text: In an attempt to purchase her pardon, the heretic and pirate Ryzza gave the Rogue Trader the coordinates of one of her caches containing her ill-gotten gains. The Lord Captain had best requisition the plundered goods before other pirates discover them.
